Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:



"As fast as you can!  Not a moment to spare!  Onward!  ONWARD!" the 
Archbishop yelled, the Brotherhood heading in the general direction of South 
America from their base in Mongolia.

Sun Crusher and Reflector were almost as excited as their leader.  They were 
about to find another piece of the puzzle about their Dark Messiah.
